description:
By Kotex® Regular Tampons give you all the protection you need in a slim and comfortable design. These tampons are perfect for those medium flow days. Unlike skinny jeans 'slim' means comfortable, so that makes them so much easier to use. Their slender tip means it's easier to use while offering you leakage protection with the last line of defence. Wear your favourite pair of undies without fear with U by Kotex® Tampons.


  • Leakage protection with the last line of defence
  • U BY KOTEX tampons offer period protection with oh so slender tip and slim design for easy use
  • Individually packaged with coloured twist-open wrappers
  • Perfect for medium flow days, with 11g absorbency
  • Come in handy purse packs

    • This product may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase. Follow the directions for use. Refer to Warnings and Disclaimers below for health warnings.

      IMPORTANT: Tampon use has been associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Read and keep the information enclosed in the pack. Do not use if film wrapper is open or damaged.
name: U By Kotex Tampons Regular Regular 16 Pack
